categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: Rebel Fleet Command, also known simply as Fleet Command, referred to the command section of the Alliance Fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Around the time of Operation Fracture in 0 BBY, Colonel Anj Zavor was part of Fleet Command, working as the Yavin 4 liaison to Admiral Raddus. Sometime after the Battle of Endor, Lieutenant Shara Bey flew in a patrol screening of the fleet for three days.
